backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing player creation, game creation, throw/turn recording, and state storage with simple ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: JSON placeholder for feature evidence with an empty feature list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of several frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity login, state management, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating players and games via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom dart-themed design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: UI-heavy landing page presenting features, hero section, and project overview.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container settings, and extended utilities with plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing backend architecture goals, issues, and feature requests for a Motoko-based dart scoring service.
